result.eng: They are on American soil now.
result.ga: Tá siad ar thalamh Mheiriceá anois
result.orig: Tá siad ar thalamh Mheiriceá anois
result.html: Tá siad ar thalamh Mheiriceá anoisThey are on American soil now.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ar ṫalaṁ Ṁeiriceá anoisThey are on American soil now.

result.eng: The spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ga: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.orig: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó Mheiriceá
result.html: Bhí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a choinneáil ar lucht gnó MheiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí dualgas ar an spiaire súil a ċoinneáil ar luċt gnó ṀeiriceáThe spy's duty was to keep an eye on America's business community.

result.eng: The question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ga: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.orig: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.html: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí RúiseachaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ponchtml: An ċeist is mó atá ag déanaṁ scime do ẛeirḃísí rúnda Ṁeiriceá ná cá ḃfuil na spiairí RúiseaċaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ga: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.orig: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.html: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar MheiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé seal i bPáras sular ṫug sé aġaiḋ ar ṀeiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: It seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ga: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.orig: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.html: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċosúil go raiḃ níos mó eitleáin i spéarṫa Ṁeiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ga: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóir
result.html: Ba léir go raibh Stáit Aontaithe Mheiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollmhóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
result.ponchtml: Ba léir go raiḃ Stáit Aontaiṫe Ṁeiriceá ag pleanáil díoltais ollṁóirClearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre seaċtainí i ndiaiḋ na n-ionsaiṫe rinne fórsaí Ṁeiriceá ionruaṫar isteaċ san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: Both countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ga: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.orig: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonn
result.html: Tá trúpaí Mheiriceá sa dá thír sin fós deich mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.
result.ponchtml: Tá trúpaí Ṁeiriceá sa dá ṫír sin fós deiċ mbliana anonnBoth countries still have American troops in them, ten years later.

result.eng: Some people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ga: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.orig: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór
result.html: Táthar ann a deir nach raibh in ionsaithe an 11ú Meán Fomhair ach leithscéal do Mheiriceá cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar ann a deir naċ raiḃ in ionsaiṫe an 11ú Meán Foṁair aċ leiṫscéal do Ṁeiriceá cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mórSome people say the 11 September attacks were only an excuse for America to wage war against the whole world.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: I was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ga: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.orig: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shin
result.html: Cuireadh mo chéad chuairt ar Mheiriceá i gcuimhne dom blianta fada ó shinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ mo ċéad ċuairt ar Ṁeiriceá i gcuiṁne dom blianta fada ó ẛinI was reminded of my first visit to America, many years ago.
